### Pairwise comparison

Values in table are p-values for each subset data between group 1 and group 2.

```{r}

pairwise_models <- build_pairwise_logrank(data_surv,
                      variables =var,
                      p.adjust.method = 'fdr',
                      pivot_wider = FALSE
                       )
kable(pairwise_models)
```
